LanguageData.VSIE.RandomSelectionInsteadOfUI: Perform random trait selection from trait pools instead of showing the UI for manual selection
LanguageData.VSIE.MaxTraitCount: Max trait count for random or manual selection: {0}
LanguageData.VSIE.PickTrait: Choose a trait for {0_nameDef} to obtain
LanguageData.VSIE.AddCancelButtonToUI: Add cancel button to the selection UI
LanguageData.VSIE.MarriedTraitChange: When {PAWN_nameDef} got married to the love of {PAWN_possessive} life, {PAWN_pronoun} has developed the {0} trait.\n\n{1}
LanguageData.VSIE.BecameParentTraitChange: Upon the arrival of {PAWN_possessive} newborn, {PAWN_nameDef} is excited about becoming a parent and has developed the {0} trait.\n\n{1}
LanguageData.VSIE.BecameParentStillbornTraitChange: Devastated by {PAWN_possessive} stillborn child, {PAWN_nameDef} has developed the {0} trait.\n\n{1}
